short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows a different Chinese (simplified Mandarin) character in each newtab screen.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Select which lesson you have learned up to and the new tab page will display a random learned character every time. Hover over to reveal more details, click to open in Google Translate.
